content: Stream created by Eric Forgy.
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream working: discrete geometry and entanglement to deprecated: discrete geometry and entanglement.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the posting permissions for this stream:

  • Old permissions: All stream members can post.
  • New permissions: Only organization administrators and moderators can post.
